committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Insurance

official_title: To require that federally insured depository institutions establish random drug testing programs.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to require each Federal banking agency to: (1) prescribe regulations requiring insured depository institutions with financial problems to establish periodic random controlled substance testing of directors and officers; and (2) provide for removal and barring of personnel who test positive or who refuse to submit to the test from further participation in the conduct of the affairs of any insured depository institution.

titles.title: To require that federally insured depository institutions establish random drug testing programs.
